## Discussion

Use this property if you choose to support configuring the description visibility in your custom style. It reflects the value that the ancestor view sets with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/productDescription(_:)] view modifier.

# descriptionVisibility

**Instance Property**

The visibility of product descriptions.

## Declaration

```swift
var descriptionVisibility: Visibility { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property if you choose to support configuring the description visibility in your custom style. It reflects the value that the ancestor view sets with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/productDescription(_:)] view modifier.
title: descriptionVisibility
